MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD15 postcode area of Berwick Upon Tweed, affecting properties in Longstone View and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.13pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault on Pier road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:54PM on Friday 05 March 2021.
